value.title: DAX Fridays! #48: TIME (Calculate working hours)
value.excerpt: In today's DAX Fridays we will learn how Power pivot or Power BI manages time using the TIME function. We will also create an example with the TIME function where we will calculate the working hours in a calendar. value.title: Monitor usage with Power BI audit logs
value.excerpt: You can turn on audit logs in Power BI to monitor what users are doing in Power BI. This tool is perfect for troubleshoot and to help you document what is being done in Power BI and use it to comply with laws like GDPR.  To turn it on, you need an E3 or E5 office 365 license.
